org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache

Interface GridCacheVersionedFuture<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GridCacheFuture<T>, IgniteInternalFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridDhtColocatedLockFuture, GridDhtLockFuture, GridDhtTxPrepareFuture, GridLocalLockFuture, GridNearLockFuture, GridNearOptimisticSerializableTxPrepareFuture, GridNearOptimisticTxPrepareFuture, GridNearOptimisticTxPrepareFutureAdapter, GridNearPessimisticTxPrepareFuture, GridNearTxPrepareFutureAdapter

    public interface GridCacheVersionedFuture<T>
extends GridCacheFuture<T>
    Distributed future aware of lock version.
